verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* seek: \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart thirsts \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* body faints \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* parched \w and|strong="H3063"\w* waterless land.

\w As|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H4325"\w* temple \w have|strong="H4325"\w* seen \w you|strong="H5315"\w*, beholding \w your|strong="H7836"\w* power \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w your|strong="H7836"\w* glory,
\w for|strong="H3651"\w* better than life \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* kindness: \w my|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w shall|strong="H5797"\w* utter \w your|strong="H7200"\w* praise.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w*, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* bless \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H2617"\w* lift up \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w in|strong="H2896"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name.

\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* marrow \w and|strong="H3709"\w* fat am \w I|strong="H3651"\w* feasted; \w with|strong="H3651"\w* joyful lips \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w praise|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* call \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* muse \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* night watches;

\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w been|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* joyfully sing \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wings.
\w I|strong="H3588"\w* cling close \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w your|strong="H3588"\w* right hand holds \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3225"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* seek \w after|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H8551"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* go down \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8551"\w* depths \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8551"\w* earth,

given \w o|strong="H3068"\w*â€™er \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* power \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* sword, or \w as|strong="H5315"\w* prey \w for|strong="H1245"\w* jackals \w to|strong="H1245"\w* devour.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*: \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w allegiance|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* glory. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* false \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* stopped.
